title: Harper Beckham supports Brooklyn amid family feud | 7NEWS
description: Harper Beckham, 14, posted a Valentine's Day tribute to her brothers on Instagram, which was shared by mother Victoria Beckham amid ongoing family tensions. Brooklyn Beckham did not acknowledge his sister's post and instead shared a photo of his wife Nicola, declaring his support for her. Brooklyn has also unfollowed celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay on social media after Ramsay commented on the family situation. title: Organised crime recruits teens for tobacco war | 7NEWS
description: Police are investigating two separate crime incidents involving organised criminal activity in Australian cities. In Sydney's Westmead, two vehicles were deliberately set alight with a fuel tank explosion sending burning petrol down the street. In Western Australia, organised crime syndicates including links to the Comancheros outlaw motorcycle gang are recruiting teenagers to firebomb convenience stores as part of a violent illicit tobacco trade war, prompting police to seize 3.9 million cigarettes worth $4.5 million and announce tighter laws to combat the growing criminal enterprise. title: Night shift eating patterns linked to disease risk | 7NEWS
description: Night shift workers face greater risk of diseases like type 2 diabetes and cancer when they deviate from regular eating patterns. University of Queensland researchers have discovered that disrupted circadian rhythms affect the liver's protein release, which is linked to meal timing. More than one million Australians work night shifts, experiencing sleep disruption and health challenges from irregular eating and caffeine consumption during overnight hours. title: Legendary actor Robert Duvall dies aged 95
description: Robert Duvall, the commanding and supremely versatile actor who earned a lasting place in American movie history as a stoic Mafia consigliere in The Godfather, a surf-loving Army colonel in Apocalypse Now and a washed-up country crooner in Tender Mercies, died Sunday. He was 95. #robertduvall #apocalypsenow #thegodfather #actor #hollywood

title: Massive storm causes flooding in France
description: At least two people have been killed and 900,000 left without power after a powerful storm ripped through southwest France. #storm #flood #weather #wildweather #france

title: Extreme fire conditions forecast for Victoria
description: A total fire ban is in place across five of Victoria's districts as hot, gusty weather elevates bushfire danger. #fire #bushfire #firedanger #victoria #fireban

title: Russia and Ukraine meet for second round of peace talks | 7NEWS
description: Senior officials from Russia, the United States and Ukraine are meeting in Switzerland for the second round of US-brokered peace talks. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy faces mounting pressure to reach an agreement, though a political breakthrough remains unlikely. Kyiv continues to reject Russia's key demand for territorial concessions, while disagreements persist over US security guarantees. title: Kremlin denies dart frog poison killed Navalny | 7NEWS
description: The Kremlin has rejected allegations that Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny was killed with poison derived from dart frog skin in a Siberian prison. UK and European authorities made this finding two years after his death. Dozens of mourners gathered at his grave to mark the second anniversary of his death. title: UK follows Australia with social media crackdown | 7NEWS
description: The British government is fast-tracking restrictions to protect children under 16 on social media, following Australia's lead. UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer will announce new reforms including limitations on AI chatbots, banning endless scrolling, and restricting children's access to VPNs that enable access to illegal content. The sweeping legislation represents a significant government crackdown on social media platforms. title: Burst water main leaves dozens of Brisbane homes dry | 7NEWS
description: A major water main burst on Wynnum Road in Tingalpa, Brisbane has left approximately 45-50 homes and Tingalpa State School without water. The pipe burst occurred at 11:45am, flooding the major road, nearby streets and homes, and bringing traffic to a standstill. Urban Utilities crews worked through the night to access and repair the burst main, with traffic diversions remaining in place and the school operating with portable toilets and tank water while advising parents to keep children home if possible. title: Shooting at US school hockey match kills two
description: At least two people are dead and another three are injured after a shooter opened fire during a high school hockey game in Pawtucket, Rhode Island, on Monday, according to the local police chief.  Officers we called to Dennis M. Lynch Arena for reports of a shooting just before 2:30 p.m. E.T., Pawtucket Police Department Chief Tina Goncalves said.  #hockey #icehockey #highschool #crime #RhodeIsland

title: Budget cuts, teacher burnout and lawn mowing etiquette | 7NEWS
description: The federal government faces increasing pressure to reduce spending in its upcoming budget, with voters supporting cuts to foreign aid but disagreeing on other areas. Victoria's teachers union is proposing a four-day working week and job-sharing arrangements to address the staffing crisis in education. A social media debate has erupted over lawn mowing etiquette after a photo showed one neighbour mowing only their side of a shared nature strip.
